content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'azuresynapse_samasterclouddev01_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [azuresynapse_samasterclouddev01_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://azuresynapse@samasterclouddev01.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.listings (
	[id] nvarchar(4000),
	[name] nvarchar(4000),
	[host_id] nvarchar(4000),
	[host_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[neighbourhood_group] nvarchar(4000),
	[neighbourhood] nvarchar(4000),
	[latitude] nvarchar(4000),
	[longitude] nvarchar(4000),
	[room_type] nvarchar(4000),
	[price] nvarchar(4000),
	[minimum_nights] nvarchar(4000),
	[number_of_reviews] nvarchar(4000),
	[last_review] nvarchar(4000),
	[reviews_per_month] nvarchar(4000),
	[calculated_host_listings_count] nvarchar(4000),
	[availability_365] nvarchar(4000),
	[number_of_reviews_ltm] nvarchar(4000),
	[license] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'listing.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [azuresynapse_samasterclouddev01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.listings
GO
